content: materials - 10 13 balls of purl soho s knitting yarn dk 1 100% merino wool each ball is 219 yards/ 100 grams approximately 2110 2725 yards required we used the color birch bark - us 7 4 5 mm 40- or 47-inch circular needles 2 - a cable stitch holder 3 gauge 26 stitches and 25 5 row = 4 inches in 2×2 rib blocked and relaxed sizes crib throw finished dimensions 37¾ inches wide x 54 inches long 42¾ inches wide x 61½ inches long sample we knit the crib size original emblem scarf 4 designed by jake canton for purl soho this version designed by hiromi glover 1 https //www purlsoho com/knitting-yarn-dk html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23859 4 https //www purlsoho com/create/2020/03/23/emblem-scarf/
